function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to spatial distancing or isolation measures","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, higher risk of infection and transmission","Mitigation":"Clear communication and education on the importance of spatial distancing and isolation, enforcement of regulations and guidelines","Technologies":"Digital communication tools for remote interaction, monitoring and enforcement technologies","People":"General population, at-risk individuals, communities","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Negative impact on psychological wellbeing due to reduced social interaction","Impact":"Increased mental health issues, such as depression and anxiety","Mitigation":"Promotion of remote social interaction tools and activities, mental health support services, awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms, mental health apps, telemedicine services","People":"Individuals in confinement, at-risk populations, communities","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals, community organizations"},{"Description":"Spread of misinformation","Impact":"Undermined public trust in authorities, misinformed public behavior, increased risk of infection due to incorrect information","Mitigation":"Fact-checking, clear and transparent communication from trustworthy sources, education on identifying and avoiding misinformation","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, real-time information sharing platforms, digital media literacy resources","People":"General population, online communities, individuals seeking information","Owner":"Media organizations, government agencies, educational institutions"}]}
